headline: Does the Sale of NFP Wealth Signal Opportunity in Aon Stock for 2025?
summary: Trying to figure out what to do with Aon stock lately? You are definitely not alone. Whether you are watching from the sidelines or holding on after a long run, Aon has been the center of plenty of market chatter this year. The stock most recently closed at $353.36, and while short-term returns have dipped, the long view tells a story of resilience. Over the past year, Aon is down just -0.7%. If you look at returns over three and five years, you will notice gains of 30.4% and 75.8%,...
